forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.
